issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The remote streaming video when paused and application put to background, starts to play automatically when application brought to foreground. Also when it starts playing it initially plays video for first couple of seconds of the video and then resumes from the point where it was paused.

Not a Regression. This also occurs on 2.0.2

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open Kitchen Application
2. Go to Phone -> Play Movie -> Remote Streaming
3. Let the video play for few seconds
4. Pause the video and background the Kitchen Sink application
5. Again open the Kitchen Sink application (to bring to foreground)

Actual: The video starts to pay itself. Also it initially plays video and sound of the first few seconds of the video and then resumes playing from the point it was paused.

Expected: The video should remain in paused state when the application again comes to foreground
fields.summary: Android: VideoPlayer: The paused Remote Streaming video starts playing when application brought back to foreground and initially resumes from wrong point
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio: 2.1.0.201206211609
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120621184154
Android Device: Android 2.2, Samsung Tab(V3.2)
Runtime: v8

comments.body:
Issue reproduces with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 (03/11/13 15:43 0c88429)
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 (02/07/13 16:46 a4def81)
Device: Samsung galaxy s duos Android version: 4.0.4

jithinpv
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
